summary: A small re-texture mod that makes the pick-able plants easier to spot while they still naturally fit in the environment.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod for people who likes the scenery of Skyrim, but wants it to be a bit easier to find the \'pick-able\' plants. This small mod makes all the flowers and plants that spawned in the nature easier to find because of enhanced color correction.  I tried my hardest to make it so they still fit in the nature, so it doesn\'t look \'cartoonish\' 

Installation:

Download the .rar file and use a program like WinZip/WinRar to extract the folders to your \'skyrim\\Data\\textures\' folder.
If you don\'t have a texture folder, just make one. 



Enjoy!
Feedback is highly appreciated, it helps me improve! :) 

Notes:
-If you see any plants that isn\'t easy enough to see, or are too colorful let me know in the        comments or by message, so I can improve it. 
-I\'m also doing requests for recoloring textures etc, so let me know the same way as above if  you have any requests. 
-Readme includes change-log, to do list and uninstalling guide. 



These plants & pick-able items are re-textured
Birdnest
Chickennest 
Creepclusters
Deathbell
Giant lichen
Nirnroot
Lavender
Mountainflower (Red, blue & purple)
Nightshade
Slaughterfish egg
Snow berry
Swamp fungal 
Thistle
Tundra Cotton
Beehive
Mora tapinella 
Chauruseggs and eggsack
author: Firstprice
